definitions.text: one of the persons who compose a social group (especially individuals who have joined and participate in a group organization)
examples: she was introduced to all the members of his family

definitions.text: anything that belongs to a set or class
examples: snakes are members of the class Reptilia

definitions.text: an external body part that projects from the body
examples: it is important to keep the extremities warm

definitions.text: an organization that is a member of another organization (especially a state that belongs to a group of nations)
examples: the library was a member of the interlibrary loan association
Canada is a member of the United Nations

definitions.text: the male organ of copulation (`member' is a euphemism)
